name: procrastiRUN
description:
Markus is doing his best to get through high school, and this is the last assignment of the year and his chances at graduation. After procrastinating like a typical teenager, he had to rush to school! However, in his hurry, his backpack was left open, and now all his notes are scattered around the town! 

Avoid stray dogs, bombarding birds, and cunning rats and save your academic career!

Get out there and find your notes, and get back to class in time to get your assignment in, or else get held back for one more year!
